channel.title: [PI] Need help with editing drop tables
channel.description:
I've just added dungeoneering to my server, and I'm trying to make it so that each boss I kill drops a certain amount of tokens and they key needed for the next portal. I went into my NPCDrops.TSM and wrote this at the bottom: [code]#Bouncer 296:100 2478:5 275:1[/code]
I compiled with no errors but after running My server I was given this error: java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516) at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:70) [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3... 3... 1... Starting...Now! [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 Help is much appreciated.

item.title: [PI] Need help with editing drop tables
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

If your server is 317 don’t add dungeoneering… it’s pointless and destroys the purpose of a 317.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Need help with editing drop tables

item.title: [PI] Need help with editing drop tables
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

I’ve just added dungeoneering to my server, and I’m trying to make it so that each boss I kill drops a certain amount of tokens and they key needed for the next portal. I went into my NPCDrops.TSM and wrote this at the bottom:

#Bouncer 296:100 2478:5 275:1

I compiled with no errors but after running My server I was given this error:
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found
at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516)
at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37)
at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.(NPCDrops.java:15)
at server.Server.(server.java:70)
[6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3… 3… 1… Starting…Now!
[6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
Help is much appreciated.

Read full topic
